definition: general rule/general principle
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items

sentences.english: NPC deputies will review the draft general provisions of civil law of China.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大代表將審議《民法通則草案》總則。

sentences.english: They may be used to interpret or supplement domestic law.
sentences.chinese: 通則可用以解釋或補充國內法。

sentences.english: "General Principles of Civil Law" is the basis of establishment of civil code.
sentences.chinese: 《民法通則》是民法總則編制定的基礎與胚胎。

sentences.english: The stipulation of lost property in the Civil Law of our country is too simple and general.
sentences.chinese: 我國民法通則對拾得制度的規定過於簡略。

sentences.english: The staff of IMCO shall be employed and managed by the personnel department of IMCO according to general rules.
sentences.chinese: 其他工作人員由人事部門依照層級管理的通則任用。

sentences.english: These Principles set forth general rules for international commercial contracts.
sentences.chinese: 通則旨在爲國際商事合同制定一般規則。

definition: to become a mere formality
to assess one's income and spend accordingly (idiom); to live within one's means/You can only spend what you earn.
responsible for its profit and losses (of organization)/financially autonomous/personal financial responsibility
dispute involving litigation/legal dispute
bring order out of chaos/set to rights things which have been thrown into disorder
to take turns/to work by roster
to hold a (business) meeting/to start negotiations
(idiom) to use methods appropriate to the current situation
separation of powers
plan of convenience (idiom); stop-gap measure/makeshift stratagem/interim step
to treat the symptoms/reactive (rather than proactive)
to stipulate/to state expressly/to explicitly provide for
to declare at the outset (idiom)
proposal/recommendation/to draft
jurisdiction
agricultural worker/abbr. for 農業工人|农业工人/peasant and worker (in Marxism)
